name: Dai Gyakuten Saiban 2: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Kakugo (Ace Attorney)
name_original: Dai Gyakuten Saiban 2: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Kakugo (Ace Attorney)
description:
Dai Gyakuten Saiban 2: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Kakugo (Ace Attorney) is an adventure game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Capcom. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Dai Gyakuten Saiban 2: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Kakugo (Ace Attorney) on iOS, Android and Nintendo 3DS.
